summary: Apex predator of logistics efficiency. 15+ years architecting high‑volume dispatch, automation, and freight systems. Proven record reducing downtime 30%, cutting manual time 40%, and maintaining 99% on‑time delivery across California and Nevada. Unrelenting focus on detail, data‑driven optimization, and secure API integration.

bullets: Architected internal automation tools that cut manual reporting time by 40%
Implemented JWT/Okta authentication to secure driver & route data
Built Apache Genie CLI for rapid server deployment
Executed high‑volume last‑mile fuel deliveries, maintaining 4.9+ rating
Optimized delivery windows using real‑time routing
Designed custom scheduling system that cut downtime 30%
Maintained 99% on‑time delivery to Walmart & Costco
Ensured DOT compliance and audit‑ready logs
Led brokerage operations, negotiated rates with 500+ carriers
Automated load tracking and invoicing, boosting efficiency 25%

experience.role: IT Systems Implementation Lead / Warehouse Associate
bullets: Deployed first UPC‑based POS, eliminating pricing errors
Founded early cloud hosting provider, managed Unix/Linux infrastructure
Implemented automation for persistent identity services

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress), Modesto Junior College
Culinary Arts Program, Placer County Adult Education
